title: Alaso USA Inc. Contracting
body: Developing and testing full stack applications and systems to automate and optimize warehouse operations ranging from utilities as printing labels to measuring production output per machine and warehouse employee.

title: FCFMN Construction Tracking Contracting
body: Built a full stack web application to track construction sites for the construction contractors of the FCFMN organization.
Building spreadsheet data management UI component to do bulk editing.

title: TheLeadLion Contracting/Consulting
body: Aided in the development of a lead engine using Node.js on AWS using Lambda functions, SQS, SNS and EC2 instances to process and control the flow of leads.

title: Studio Birdsall LLC Employment
body: Managed and developed fully custom dynamic web solutions and applications for eCommerce and corporate clients on Wordpress, Magento, and Shopify.
Built site crawler that takes full screen snapshots of each page and stores diffs of new and old snapshots to identify changes site wide.

title: MyMailbox GPG2 Inc. Contracting
body: Designed and developed all of the software for a physical smart mailbox notification system that works with Particleâ€™s IOT micro-controller cloud systems, delivering notifications through Twilio with Node.js.
Developed Alexa Application that reports information from the MyMailbox servers using Node.js and the Alexa Skills Kit.

title: BrandCo LLC Employment
body: Built a full stack Email Tracking System called Cue supported on Chrome, Firefox, Outlook and iOS with a small development team that reported directly to employer. For more information see cue.io.
Developed a Client Review System that monitored and distributed client satisfaction per client-employee interaction.
